page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE IN DURHAM
page.content: The average family owns a modern well equipped home with an average of two or three children,so that nursery education is in great demand. Often both parents work and children will be taken to school by car,most families owning one,after breakfast. The traditional bacon and eggs meal is now often a weekend treat,making way for the quicker one of cereal & toast with tea or coffee. Mothers at home have a busy day with young children & pets,especially a dog which needs exercise,housework,cooking & shopping. Working parents eat out at lunchtime and children have a meal at school. Families gather again for an evening meal,often eaten viewing TV.At week- ends main shopping is done together and leisure pursuits such as sport, gardening,visiting and entertaining are enjoyed.
